page.title: 01Royston Hertfordshire
page.content: Royston is a medium-sized town on the boundary of Hertfordshire and Cambridgeshire. From here you can travel to London and Cambridge.It is a quiet town since the by-pass opened. Royston is surrounded by open country side. Therfield Heath lies to the south west. To the west and north is farmland. It is mostly arable. Royston has some light industy but many people commute to London. A market is held every Wednesday and Saturday.There is a wide range of shops in the town and one supermarket. There is a variety of housing, some of it quite close to the town centre. There is a range of leisure activities including a cinema, facilities for a number of sports, and two parks.
